The company owns and operates a collection of subscription-based services focused largely on analytics, including scientific and academic research, pattern analytics, regulatory standards, trademark protection, pharmaceutical and biotechnology intelligence, domain brand protection and intellectual property management.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It is an independent company with over 4,000 employees and operations in more than 100 countries. Clarivate is on a bold entrepreneurial mission to help radically reduce the time from new ideas to life-changing innovations.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Clarivate Analytics was formerly the \\\"Intellectual Property and Science\\\" business of\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomson_Reuters\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Thomson Reuters\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". In 2016 Thomson Reuters struck a $3.55 billion-dollar deal in which they spun it off into an independent company and sold it to private-equity firms Onex Corporation.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In May 2018, Clarivate Analytics launched Arabic citation index worldwide.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
